description: Create Visitor experience strategies for national memorials in France
full_summary:
=================
### Visitor Experience Strategy Planning, Facilitation and Writing Services

**Tender Information**
---------------------

* **Reference Number:** cb-7240-30175682
* **Solicitation Number:** 3000758808/B
* **Publication Date:** 2023-07-14
* **Closing Date:** 2023-08-14T14:00:00

**Notice Overview**
------------------

Veterans Affairs Canada invites interested parties to participate in the procurement process for visitor experience design services. The successful bidder will provide planning, facilitation, analysis, and writing services to create site-specific visitor experience strategies at the Canadian National Vimy Memorial and the Beaumont-Hamel Newfoundland Memorial in France.

**Objectives**
--------------

The objective of this procurement is to award a contract to a visitor experience design firm to develop strategic plans for enhancing the visitor experience at the aforementioned memorials. The contract duration is expected to begin on September 1, 2023, and end on June 30, 2024.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The scope of work includes:

* Developing site-specific visitor experience strategies for the Canadian National Vimy Memorial and the Beaumont-Hamel Newfoundland Memorial
* Providing planning and facilitation services to support the development of the visitor experience strategies
* Conducting analysis to identify opportunities for enhancing the visitor experience
* Drafting and editing the visitor experience strategies in both English and French

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact Susan O'Brien at:

* Email: [susan.obrien@veterans.gc.ca](mailto:susan.obrien@veterans.gc.ca)
* Phone: (902) 314-8488

**Attachments**
--------------

The tender notice and attachments are available on the Canada Buys website at:

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7240/3000758808b---rfp---visitor-experience-strategy_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7240/3000758808b---rf
